data.title: The Wheel of Time cast: Full list of main characters and actors
data.meta_description: Rosamund Pike leads the cast of The Wheel of Time, an epic new fantasy series which Amazon Prime Video hopes will be its answer to Game of Thrones.
data.text:
Alongside plenty of returning stars from season 1, the second season of The Wheel of Time also welcomes a number of new faces, including Maja Simonsen, Ragga Ragnars, Jay Duffy and Rima Te Wiata.

There has also been one notable change to The Wheel of Time season 2 cast, with Mat Cauthon actor Barney Harris being swapped out for Dónal Finn – no official reason has been given for the decision.

If you're looking for a refresher before the latest episodes drop, read on for an introduction to the cast and characters of The Wheel of Time on Prime Video.

More like this

Who's in the cast of The Wheel of Time season 2?

Rosamund Pike plays Moiraine

Who is Moiraine? Moiraine is a member of the Aes Sedai, an organisation comprised of women capable of wielding magic. She is tasked with seeking out the reincarnation of the Dragon, an individual who will either save or destroy the world – her influence could be the factor that sways it one way or the other. No pressure. Things are particularly tough for Moiraine in season 2, as she has been cut off from her magical powers.

What else has Rosamund Pike been in? Pike received an Academy Award nomination for her performance in David Fincher's Gone Girl adaptation. More recently, she drew further acclaim for her lead roles in biopic A Private War and thriller I Care A Lot.

Daniel Henney plays al'Lan Mandragoran

Who is al'Lan Mandragoran? Lan serves as warder to Moiraine which, put simply, is a similar role to that of a bodyguard.

What else has Daniel Henney been in? Henney is probably best known for his role in the Criminal Minds franchise, where he played the role of Matt Simmons. He also played the villainous Agent Zero in X-Men Origins: Wolverine, while he also lent his voice to the character of Tadashi Hamada in Disney's Big Hero 6.

Marcus Rutherford plays Perrin Aybara

Who is Perrin? Perrin is a blacksmith and another member of Moiraine's gang. At the end of season 1, Perrin made an extraordinary discovery – an artefact called the Horn of Valere – only to have it snatched away by the treacherous Padan Fain.

What else has Marcus Rutherford been in? Rutherford stared in indie films Obey and County Lines, while he also appeared in the second season of Sky's Bulletproof.

Barney Harris (season 1) and Dónal Finn (season 2) play Mat Cauthon

Who is Mat Cauthon? Mat is another young person picked out by Moiraine for her quest.

What else has Dónal Finn been in? Finn replaces Barney Harris, who portrayed Mat in season 1.

“It’s always hard but we’re really lucky that Barney is so great in the first season; I love him in the show,” showrunner Rafe Judkins told Deadline. “And Dónal Finn, who is playing Mat in season two, is amazing.

"I have seen him up on set doing his scenes now and they’re incredible and they fully capture the character. I think it’s a testament to this character and how great the character of Mat is that it really feels seamless between the two actors.”

Finn's past credits include Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore and BBC One's SAS: Rogue Heroes.

Sophie Okonedo plays Siuan Sanche

Who is Siuan Sanche? Sanche holds the Amyrlin Seat, which makes her the leader of the Aes Sedai.

What else has Sophie Okonedo been in? Okonedo is a well-known British actor, who came to international recognition with her critically acclaimed performance in harrowing drama Hotel Rwanda. Her other projects include Flack, Criminal: UK, Ratched and Britannia.

Josha Stradowski plays Rand al'Thor

Who is Rand al'Thor? Rand is a shepherd and one of the young people that Moiraine takes on her epic quest. Over the course of season 1, he discovered that he was, in fact, the Dragon Reborn. In light of this revelation, he chose to continue his journey solo and instructed Moiraine to tell his friends that he is dead.

What else has Josha Stradowski been in? This is the first English-language screen role for the Dutch actor.

Madeleine Madden plays Egwene al'Vere

Who is Egwene al'Vere? Egwene rounds out the selection of five young people that Moiraine believes could be the reincarnation of the Dragon.

What else has Madeleine Madden been in? The actor has appeared in several projects produced in her native Australia, while she also co-starred in 2019 children's adaptation Dora and the Lost City of Gold.

Read more: Why The Wheel of Time changed The Dragon Reborn story

Zoë Robins plays Nynaeve al'Meara

Who is Nynaeve al'Meara? Nynaeve is a healer in the quaint village where Moiraine suddenly arrives one night. We last saw her readying to defend the city of Fal Dara.

What else has Zoë Robins been in? She appeared in the festive-themed horror movie Black Christmas and two episodes of MTV fantasy series The Shannara Chronicles.

Álvaro Morte plays Logain Ablar

Who is Logain Ablar? Logain is a False Dragon, a powerful figure in the world of The Wheel of Time, who is captured by the Aes Sedai after a bloody battle.

What else has Álvaro Morte been in? Morte is known around the world for playing The Professor on Netflix's smash-hit Spanish thriller, Money Heist.

Natasha O'Keeffe plays Lanfear

Who is Lanfear? One of the Forsaken, a group of magic users who bound themselves to the Dark One during the War of Power.

What else has Natasha O'Keeffe been in? Viewers will recognise O'Keefe from her roles in crime drama Peaky Blinders, dark comedy-drama Filth and sci-fi show Misfits.

Meera Syal as Verin Mathwin

Who is Verin Mathwin? An Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah.

What else has Meera Syal been in? Syal is best known for her roles in legal drama The Split as well as comedies Yesterday and You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger.

Maja Simonsen plays Chiad

Who is Chiad? Chiad is a Maiden of the Spear of the Stones River sept of the Goshien Aiel. She is bonded as a first-sister to Bain.

What else has Maja Simonsen been in? Simonsen is a Danish actress who fans will recognise from her previous roles in action series Treadstone and Netflix comedy drama Emily in Paris.

Ceara Coveney plays Elayne Trakand

Who is Elayne Trakand? The heir to the throne of Andor, a kingdom in the world of The Wheel of Time. In season 2, Elaine joins Egwene al’Vere (Madeleine Madden) and Nynaeve al’Meara (Zoe Robins) as a novice in the White Tower, where the women attempt to master the One Power.

What else has Ceara Coveney been in? The actress has previously appeared in Netflix drama Young Wallander and the film Hoard.

Ragga Ragnars plays Bain

Who is Bain? Bain is a Maiden of the Spear of the Black Rock sect of the Shaarad Aiel.

What else has Ragga Ragnars been in? Ragnars is best known for her role in hit Prime Video drama series Vikings, in which she played the real Gunnhild, Mother of Kings.

Jay Duffy plays Dain Bornhald

Who is Dain Bornhald? Dain is a high-ranking officer of the Children of the Light.

What else has Jay Duffy been in? The Irish actor has previously appeared in Netflix comedy Derry Girls and Handsome Devil.

Rima Te Wiata plays Sheriam Bayanar

Who is Sheriam Bayanar? An Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah.

What else has Rima Te Wiata been in? The star is known for her roles in the horror movie Housebound and the comedy-drama Hunt for the Wilderpeople.

The Wheel of Time season 2 premieres on Prime Video on Friday 1st September 2023. New episodes weekly. Sign up for Amazon Prime's 30-day free trial, which renews at £8.99/month.

You can order The Wheel of Time novels on Amazon. Check out more of our Fantasy coverage or visit our TV Guide and Streaming Guide to find out what's on.

Like this? You might want to try Outlander. Available now on Lionsgate+.
